meta-description: Hesperides University is a leading academic institution committed to providing high-quality education that keeps pace with global developments, with a focus on scientific research and sustainable social impact. We believe in the importance of innovation, continuous development, and sustainability in building an outstanding academic future. We are dedicated to preparing leaders and innovators who contribute to the advancement of society.
leadershipInEducation: Leadership in Education and Scientific Research

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description1: Hesperides University is a leading academic institution striving to provide high-quality education that keeps pace with global developments, with a focus on scientific research and sustainable societal impact. We believe in the importance of innovation, continuous development, and sustainability in building an outstanding academic future, and we are committed to preparing leaders and innovators who contribute to the advancement of society.
whoWeAre.description2: Hesperides University is a young and ambitious academic institution with a vision of leadership in the fields of education, training, scientific research, and sustainable societal impact. It aims to localize high-quality education that students, parents, and the entire Libyan community aspire to, with a willingness to sacrifice a great deal for the sake of their children abroad. Hesperides University also seeks to be a role model among domestic universities by preparing a new generation of leaders and innovators.
whoWeAre.description3: We are committed to achieving academic and research excellence, developing human resources, promoting scientific research and innovation, ensuring sustainability, and enhancing societal impact while guaranteeing quality. We also focus on promoting mental health and well-being within the university community. Our goal is to offer academic programs that meet the needs of society, fulfill its aspirations and desires, in an exceptional manner characterized by diversity, inclusiveness, and integration. We aim to facilitate the provision of knowledge and skills to students in a smooth and innovative way, keeping up with development and modernity, and preparing them for success in various fields.
whoWeAre.description4: Our commitment to institutional governance has led us to focus on establishing the foundations and building blocks that will pave the way for continuous development and innovation. Therefore, we provide all the necessary tools, regulations, policies, and procedures that will serve as the foundation for excellence in management, teaching methods, and scientific research.

PresidentsMessage.title: President's Message
PresidentsMessage.message1: Hesperides University is a young and ambitious academic institution whose vision is to lead in the fields of education, training, scientific research, and sustainable community impact. It aims to localize high-quality education that meets the aspirations of students, parents, and the entire Libyan society, which has long sacrificed greatly for its children’s education abroad. Additionally, Hesperides University strives to set an example among domestic universities by preparing a new generation of leaders and innovators.
PresidentsMessage.message2: We are committed to achieving academic and research excellence, developing human resources, enhancing scientific research and innovation, promoting sustainability, and increasing societal impact. We ensure quality while fostering mental health and well-being within the university community. Our goal is to offer academic programs that meet the needs, aspirations, and ambitions of society in a distinguished manner characterized by diversity, inclusivity, and integration. We strive to provide students with knowledge and skills in a seamless and innovative way that keeps pace with progress and modernity, preparing them for success in various fields.
PresidentsMessage.message3: Our commitment to institutionalism and governance has led us to establish the foundations and pillars that drive continuous development and innovation. Therefore, we provide you with all the necessary resources, including regulations, policies, and procedures, which will serve as a launchpad for excellence in administration, teaching methods, and scientific research.

download_app_now: Download our app now and enjoy
netqoo_description: Net Qoo, where you stay connected with your loved ones and enjoy your travels wherever you are with exceptional internet coverage without interruption.
VisionDesc: We aspire to be a leading academic institution that provides advanced education aligned with global developments and contributes to building a society based on knowledge, innovation, and sustainability.
messageDec: We strive to offer distinguished academic and research programs that foster innovation and contribute to preparing qualified professionals capable of addressing challenges and finding sustainable solutions that meet societal needs.
valuesdes: Here at Hesperides University, we are committed to excellence and innovation, social responsibility, transparency, collaboration, fairness, and sustainability, to create an academic environment that fosters creativity and continuous development.
improvement_plan_paragraph: Hesperides University strives to achieve its vision of leadership in the fields of education, training, scientific research, and sustainable impact on society. This is accomplished by developing and modernizing the university's educational and administrative system in response to labor market changes.  Despite the significant increase in the number of private universities offering advanced degrees in various disciplines, demand for them remains high. The competition among these universities is no longer just about attracting students but has shifted toward ensuring high-quality performance and producing graduates who can compete with both national and international professionals from public and global universities in the job market.
code_of_ethics_paragraph_1: The charter is a set of ethical principles, standards, and duties agreed upon by members of the university community, including faculty, staff, and students. It governs work practices within the university, aiming to promote the ethical system within the institution, reinforce a sense of belonging and loyalty to the university and the nation, and serve as a reference in case of violations or transgressions.
code_of_ethics_paragraph_2: Professional ethics are a set of virtues, good qualities, and noble behaviors that individuals working in higher education and universities must adhere to, both in thought and conduct, before God, the authorities, themselves, and others.
academic_programs: ✅ Advanced academic programs that meet global quality standards and labor market needs.
scientific_research: ✅ Innovative scientific research that supports local and global solutions through leading research partnerships.
student_training: ✅ Comprehensive student training programs that enhance practical and personal skills.
entrepreneurship: ✅ Entrepreneurship and innovation through business incubators that support promising ideas and projects.
sustainability: ✅ Environmental and social sustainability in curricula and university practices.
strategic_partnerships: ✅ Strategic partnerships with local and international institutions to enhance sustainable development.
contact_us_content: If you have any inquiries, feel free to contact us through the form below or via our contact details.
applicationStep1Description: Tell us a little about yourself, and we'll help with the rest. Our convenient online application tool takes just 10 minutes to complete.
applicationStep2Description: After submitting your application, an admissions representative will contact you and assist you in completing the process.
applicationStep3Description: Once you've completed your application and spoken with an admissions representative, you'll be ready to set up your schedule.
collegesPrograms: Welcome to the Colleges and Programs website at the University of Sharjah. Your academic journey is our priority. Our programs are developed in collaboration with industry leaders, ensuring that our graduates have priority access to the best job opportunities. Here, you can easily explore various academic disciplines and colleges, as well as access rich resources to help you find the information you need. The University of Sharjah remains a leader in innovation and academic excellence by attracting distinguished faculty members, continuously investing in advanced facilities, and offering a wide range of services.
